io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.caravan.api

Interface CaravanRhyme


  • public interface CaravanRhyme
    An alternative to the generic Rhyme interface that should be used for OSGi / JAX-RS projects. Use the CaravanRhymeRequestCycle OSGi service to create one instance for each incoming request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getRemoteResource(String serviceId, String uri, Class<T> halApiInterface)
      Create a dynamic client proxy to load HAL+JSON resources from an upstream service.
      javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo getRequestUri() 
      void setResponseMaxAge(Duration duration)
      Limit the maximum time for which the response should be cached by clients and downstream services.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestUri

        javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo getRequestUri()
        Returns:
        information on the URI of the incoming request

      • getRemoteResource

        <T> T getRemoteResource(String serviceId,
                        String uri,
                        Class<T> halApiInterface)
        Create a dynamic client proxy to load HAL+JSON resources from an upstream service.
        Type Parameters:
        T - an interface annotated with HalApiInterface
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the ribbon ID for the upstream service
        uri - the absolute path of the entry point
        halApiInterface - an interface annotated with HalApiInterface
        Returns:
        a dynamic proxy instance of the provided HalApiInterface that you can use to navigate through the resources of the service

      • setResponseMaxAge

        void setResponseMaxAge(Duration duration)
        Limit the maximum time for which the response should be cached by clients and downstream services. Note that calling this method only sets the upper limit: if other upstream resource fetched during the current request indicate a lower max-age value in their header, that lower value will be used instead.
        Parameters:
        duration - the max cache time
